short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds things to cool math games to make it better! Click the icon to learn more!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds things to cool math games to make it better! It adds a full screen experience to any game with a 0 in front of it (except CMG chess). The newest version gets rid of the super-annoying popup in the middle of the game that shows an ad!

If you find any bugs, PLEASE email me ASAP so I can fix them! My email address is theostechtipsinquiries@gmail.com.
